attributes.action: Make immigrants illegal in Britain and sent the current ones back to their own country!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are too many immigrants in Britain! Terror issues are rising,so why keep letting immigrants in! They are in our country but they do not live like the british,eg:when we visit there countries we have to cover up and respect there religion but they come over here to live and bring all that with them, they dont respect Britian! So they should live in there own country!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
